486
May 25th4
Tho H. Carson. Esq
Camp Nelson. Ky
Sir

Your letter of the 23d inst to his Excellency Gov Bramlette has been referred to this office for reply. Inclosed herein I send authority to recruit for the 6 months service, and when your recruits are mustered you will receive a commission to rank according to the number so mustered. I send per this days mail a package of blank acts of enlistment --

Very Respectfully
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky.
